name: Hero on Road - Jumpy hopper and Crossing Iron robo Man across the super busy street
name_original: Hero on Road - Jumpy hopper and Crossing Iron robo Man across the super busy street
description:
Tap to help our hero cross the busy road!

You would met..
> Fast cars and trains
> water sports
> wild nature

Features
> Cute and funny characters
> Beautiful, retro styled graphics
> Simple control
> Highly addictive gameplay
